Header: 2nd Computer Course in SFHQ Jaffna Begins
Content: Computer Course-No 2 of the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J), designed to enhance IT literacy of the troops began on Tuesday (16) at the SFHQ-J in Palali. It was initiated on a proposal of the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna (SF-J), Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi and would continue for 21 days with practical and theoretical sessions. Orient Academy Private Limited, like on previous occasions gave their instructional guidance with resource personnel provided by them.
